document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2018-05
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE TO ADOPT A NEW SECTION 19.53, WHICH PROVIDES A MINISTERIAL PERMIT PROCESS FOR SMALL-CELL ANTENNA FACILITIES IN THE PUBLIC RIGHT-OF-WAY AND ALL ZONING DISTRICTS IN THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON
